"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53729f1f63687219b1730100#post_53729f1f63687219b1730100
You know, I actually like Richard Dawkins. I think he gets a bad rap as the go to asshole atheist, but goddamn does he say shit that makes it easy to turn him into a straw man.

That cartoon is actually a pretty gross over simplification of one of his arguments in the God Delusion.
